E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/30/1984
Subject: Jeffery Hebert injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Strained Back Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 5 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Lucas Pascale
Dear Sir,
Lucas Pascale has an AVG of .298 at AA Springfield Duff!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Ryan Weaver
Dear Sir,
Ryan Weaver has nothing more to prove at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .375 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/9/1984
Subject: Raimundo Patino is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/11/1984
Subject: Progress of Paul Camper
Dear Sir,
Paul Camper is doing pretty good at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an ERA of 2.57, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
